loans.name: Veronica Magdalena

texts.es:
Verónica, es casada, tiene un hijo, la familia vive junta; como una forma de tener mejor calidad de vida inicio su negocio de enmarcar fotografías en resina, no tiene un horario establecido, ella visita a sus clientes para proponer sus servicios y luego sus trabajos lo  realiza en su casa.
Invertirá en resina transparente, madera, etc., para poder trabajar y cumplir con el contrato que tiene con una empresa, espera finalizar sus productos con mayor calidad y puntualidad, esto le dará clientes satisfechos y mejores ingresos.
Sus aspiraciones son ahorrar mucho para comprar su propia casa y seguir aportando para que la familia tenga mejor alimentación, vestuario y salud.
texts.en: Veronica is married with one son, and the family lives together.  As a way of improving her quality of life, she started a business framing photographs with resin.  She doesn’t have set hours, so she visits her customers to offer her services, and then works from home.  She will invest in transparent resin, wood, etc. so that she can work and fulfill a contract that she has with a business.  She hopes to complete high quality projects in a timely manner, as this will satisfy her customers and improve her income. She hopes to save a lot to purchase her own home, and continue providing for her family so that they have better food, clothing, and health.

loans.use: to invest in transparent resin, wood, etc. so that she can work and fulfill a contract that she has with a business.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana, está acompañada, vive con sus hijos y su compañero de vida, no tiene un apoyo económico del extranjero; desde hace mucho tiempo ella ha recibido cursos de cosmetología y ya tiene 5 años que fundó su propia sala de belleza para tener ingresos con los que apoya en los gastos familiares, por el momento no representa dificultades en la administración de su negocio.
El financiamiento será de mucha ayuda para comprar cosméticos, tintes, tratamientos para el cabello, mascarillas faciales, entre otros productos que le permitan tener su sala de belleza mejor equipada, mejorara el atención a sus clientes, atraerá más clientes y espera tener mejores ingresos. 
Sus sueños son tener su negocio en un local propio, ganar popularidad en la zona y seguir aportando en los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Ana is attached and lives with her children and life partner. She receives no outside help. 

She has been attending cosmetics courses for a long time now and 5 years ago she founded her own beauty salon to make a better income to help with her family's living expenses. 

At the moment she isn't experiencing any problems managing her business. The loan will be of great help to buy cosmetics, dyes, hair treatments and face masks among other products which will allow her to have a better-equipped beauty salon. In addition, she will provide a better service to her customers, attract more customers and hopefully make a better income. 

Her dreams are to run her business from her own premises, become popular in the area and continue contributing to the family's living expenses.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, dyes, hair treatments and face masks among other products which will allow her to have a better-equipped beauty salon.

loans.name: Alakbar

texts.en:
Alakbar has a lovely family - a wife and two daughters. His wife is a housewife and helps Alakbar with his business. His elder daughter goes to university and she wants to be a teacher, while his little daughter is in the tenth grade. The family members are IDP (Internally displaced Persons) from Fuzuli city and now live in the Fuzuli region.

Alakbar has been in the animal breeding business for 10 years. He buys little calves, raises them, and sells in the bazaar to earn money. Winter is coming and he wants to buy vaccinations for his animals. Therefore he has requested a loan in amount of 1,350 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). Alakbar is thankful to Kiva and its lenders for this help. In the future, he wants to improve his daughters' lives and help them in their education.

loans.use: to buy vaccinations for his animals to increase his business so that he can improve his daughters' lives and help them in their education

loans.name: Jennifer Del Carmen

texts.es:
Jennifer  de 20 años de edad, estudio hasta 6° grado,  es madre soltera de un niño de 2 años, ellos viven con sus padres y dos hermanos.

Jennifer trabaja como empleada prestando sus servicios de domestica en la ciudad,  solo llega a su casa los fines de semana, tiene 6 años de dedicarse a este oficio. Su hijo lo deja al cuidado de su hermana, y sus hermanos que también trabajan en la agricultura.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar lamina y madera para ampliar la casita donde vive con su familia.

El sueño de Jennifer es en un futuro poder tener su casita de bloque, ya que por el momento es de lamina y poder darle a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jennifer, age 20, went to school through the sixth grade.  She is the single mother of a two year old son.  They live with her parents and two brothers.

Jennifer works as a domestic employee in the city.  She only goes home on the week-ends.  She has been doing this work for six years.  She leaves her son in the care of her sister and her brothers, who also work in agriculture.

The loan that she is requesting from CrediCampo is to buy metal sheeting and wood to expand the house where she lives with her family.

Jennifer’s dream for the future is to be able to have a house made from cement blocks.  It is now made of metal sheeting.  She also dreams of giving her son a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy metal sheeting and wood.

loans.name: Nasani

texts.en:
Nasani is a forty-year-old hardworking, married man living in Kamwenge Uganda. He deals in farming as his main source of income, alongside owning a retail shop where he earns extra income. Nasani hopes to become a leading farmer supplying maize and beans through out the year which will in turn increase his profits. However, his main challenge is price fluctuations of agricultural products. 

Nasani is requesting a loan to buy manure and seedlings for his farm.

loans.use: to buy manure and seedlings for his farm.

loans.name: Edipcia De Los Angeles

texts.es: Ser Administradora de empresas ha sido el mayor sueño de Edipcia y sus padres la han apoyado en todo el transcurso de sus estudios. Cursa el quinto año de la carrera en la universidad de León. Se siente satisfecha porque está a punto de cumplir una meta llegar a ser una profesional de éxito y lograr así poner en práctica los conocimientos adquiridos. Solicita el crédito para comprar una computadora e impresora para la realización de su monografía y sufragar los gastos de su graduación. El crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá culminar sus estudios y crecer como profesional. Sus planes futuros son trabajar en una empresa o emprender un pequeño negocio.
texts.en: Being a business manager has been a great dream Edipcia’s dream, and her parents have supported her throughout the course of her studies.  She is in her fifth year of study at the University of León.  She feels content because she is at the point of completing her goal of becoming a successful professional, and being able to put her acquired knowledge into practice.  She is requesting the loan to purchase a computer and printer to write her monograph and defray her graduation costs.  The loan will be a great help because she will be able to finish her studies and grow as a professional.

loans.use: to purchase a computer and printer to write her monograph and defray her graduation costs.

loans.name: Jose Raul

texts.es:
José, con ayuda del préstamo anterior logro comprar su vehículo para trasladar el material que utiliza en el taller de estructuras metálicas, además ofrece el servicio de viajes con lo que genera ingresos extras para cumplir con sus compromisos. Su familia tiene un mejor estilo de vida, en la actualidad solo vive con su esposa y dos nietos.
En esta oportunidad está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en llantas nuevas y otros repuestos para el vehículo, se desplazará con mayor seguridad y no ininterrumpirá sus actividades.
texts.en:
With the previous loan José managed to buy his vehicle to transport the material he uses in his metal shop.  He also offers travel services with which he generates extra income to fulfill his commitments.  His family has a better life style.  He currently lives only with his wife and two grandchildren.

He is now requesting a new loan to buy new tires and other replacement parts for the vehicle.  He will travel more safely, and his business activities will not be interrupted.

loans.use: to buy new tires and other replacement parts.

loans.name: Solomon

texts.en:
Solomon, 50 years old, is a very passionate, hardworking and dedicated farmer who hails from Kipsigak, a remote village in the Nandi Hills area of Kenya. He is committed to his wife with whom he is blessed to have five children. Like most small-scale farmers in rural Kenya, Solomon has been practicing mixed farming for the past ten years, producing milk, tea, and crops, as well as doing some small personal business. He has been able to earn a decent income. Solomon loves dairy farming and has even nicknamed one of his dairy cows “Koriot,” which is from a person’s name. He loves milking Koriot and feeding his cow is his hobby. Dairy farming is very fulfilling to Solomon. Although he makes a profit from selling milk, he is faced with one major challenge that is dragging him behind, which is the lack of a proper dairy unit. 

Solomon is seeking a loan to build a modern dairy unit. A modern dairy unit will assist him in properly feeding his cows and also being able to milk them properly. With this loan, his cows will not be affected by harsh weather conditions because they will have a comfortable place to stay. All this will result in increased production of milk and will lead to improved profits. Solomon is a believer that freedom from poverty is a basic human right and through this loan he will get out of the poverty bracket he is in right now. He believes this loan from Juhudi Kilimo and Kiva will create ripples of changes in his living conditions. Because of the partnership between Juhudi Kilimo and Kiva, aspiring men such as Solomon are assured of achieving their dreams through loans and technical financing.

loans.use: To construct a modern dairy unit

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase food and other items for his a small grocery.

loans.name: Blanca Lidia

texts.es: Blanca de 48 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija, ella se dedica a la confección de ropa desde hace varios años, su taller de costura lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y posee muchos clientes por la calidad con que realiza la ropa, Blanca está solicitando un crédito para la compra de hilos, agujas, variedad de tela, botones, elásticos, etc. y así poder continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en: Blanca is 48 years old. She lives in her own home with her daughter. She has made a living by making clothing for many years. Her sewing studio is located in her home and she has many customers because of the quality of the clothes she makes. Blanca is seeking a loan for the purchase of thread, needles, a variety of fabric, buttons, elastics, etc. so that she can continue with her work that generates a good income for her.

loans.use: to purchase thread, needles, a variety of fabric, buttons, elastics, etc.

loans.name: Gelesiano

texts.en:
Gelesiano is a hardworking, married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He deals in produce as his main source of income, a business he started in order to earn a living. Gelesiano also earns extra income from farming. He hopes to become rich and start a new business for his wife. However, he faces the difficulties of poor roads and high transportation costs.

Gelesiano will use this loan to buy more maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy more maize to sell.

loans.name: Chiêng

texts.en:
Chiêng operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. She has been involved in this business for seven years. Chiêng is 40 years old and married with two children. She lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Chiêng's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. The main hardship that Chiêng faces in her life is not having a hygenic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet. Chiêng hopes for her children to do well in school, to maintain a successful business, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet

loans.name: Nassoro

texts.en:
Nassoro, who is in his early 30s, is married with four children who are still at school. He has been selling chips for five years now. He works from 8 a.m. to after midnight daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Nassoro's 8th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to buy sacks of Irish potatoes, cooking oil and charcoal for cooking and he has paid back all his loans successfully. He is happy with the loan and appreciates Kiva for their support. He used the profit to pay school fees, bought a plot of land, started building his house and covered household expenses. He will use this loan to buy cooking oil, Irish potatoes, and a fridge so he can start selling soft drinks. He dreams of finishing building his house.

Nassoro will make share that he pays back his loan according to the loan schedule.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil, Irish potatoes, and a fridge so he can start selling soft drinks.

loans.name: Maria Linda

texts.en:
Maria Linda is a 58-year-old meat vendor from Leyte, Philippines. She has sold chicken meat for more than four years now. This is a lucrative business for Maria Linda. She also sells coconut wine.

As of now, Maria Linda is requesting a loan to buy poultry meat, a new weighing scale, and buckets for storage. This loan will enable her to augment her meat stocks, thus allowing her to sell more to her customers. In the future, Maria Linda hopes to make her business more sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy poultry meat, a new weighing scale, and buckets for storage

loans.name: Jose Horacio

texts.es:
José, obtuvo una mejor cosecha de granos básicos con la ayuda de los insumos agrícolas que pudo comprar con el crédito anterior, su familia se mantiene igual pero viviendo en mejores condiciones. 
Está solicitando un nuevo crédito para comprar dos manzanas de cultivo de jícamas, para revender el producto en el mercado, así ampliara su negocio y tendrá mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
José got a better basic grains harvest with the help of the agricultural supplies he was able to buy with the previous loan.  His family remains the same, but they are living in better conditions.

He is requesting a new loan to buy two ‘manzanas’ [a manzana is a land measurement unit equivalent to 7000 square meters] of jicama crops to resell at the market.  This way he will expand his business and have better earnings.

loans.use: to buy two parcels of jicama crops.

loans.name: Diễn

texts.en:
Diễn works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. Diễn is 49 years old and married with three children. Diễn has her business in Dong Son district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Diễn joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. She has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa FPW. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygenic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet and bathroom. In the future, Diễn hopes to remodel her house, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet and bathroom

loans.name: Karine

texts.en:
Karine lives with her big family in the frontier village of Gosh, in the Tavuah region. She lives with her husband, son, daughter-in-law, and grandchild, who is a newborn. Karine has worked for many years at the school as a librarian, but for the last 15 years she has been heavily engaged in poultry and agriculture.  Since Karine’s husband and son are employed, she manages the main part of the farm work alone. On her farm, Karine has 40 chickens and she sells a lot of eggs. On her plot of land, she cultivates and gathers a perfect harvest of potatoes and beans and also her nice orchard is full of apple trees. 

With this loan, Karine wants to start swine breeding and she will buy seven piglets, which in the period of the New Year she can sell rather profitably. She will also buy some animal fodder for them.

loans.use: to buy seven piglets and also some animal fodder for them

loans.name: Evelin Yaneth

texts.es:
Evelin, es una madre soltera esmerada en trabajar día a día para salir adelante con su familia, comparte sus días con sus dos hijos, no tiene más ingresos que los que genera al realizar la venta de ropa, ya cuenta con tres años de experiencia, lo inicio como una manera de tener ingreso para cubrir las necesidades de su hogar, lo hace de forma ambulante en un horario de siete de la mañana a cuatro de la tarde. 
Invertirá en camisas, faldas, licras, pantalones, camisas y otras prendas de vestir para tener mejores ofertes en la época navideña, pretende mejorar sus ventas, tener más clientes satisfechos y resarcir su deuda.
Para Evelin su sueño es mantearse trabajando y llegar a tener recursos económicos para abrir un almacén en el que ofrecerá mejor mercadería y mucha variedad de productos.
texts.en:
Evelin is a single mother.  She works painstakingly day to day in order to get ahead with her family.  She shares her days with her two children.  She has no other income than what she generates by selling clothes.  She has three years of experience.  She started as a way to have income to cover the household necessities.  She sells in an itinerant manner from seven in the morning until four in the afternoon.

She will buy shirts, skirts, Lycra, pants, and other clothing in order to have better sales during the Christmas season.  She aims to improve her sales, to have more satisfied customers, and to repay her debt.

Evelin’s dream is to keep working and to have the financial resources to open a store where she will sell better merchandise and a great variety of products.

loans.use: to buy shirts, skirts, Lycra, pants, and other clothing.

loans.name: Deysi Del Carmen

texts.es:
Deysi, ha tenido un efecto positivo al invertir el crédito anterior en su negocio, ya que logro tener materia prima para elaborar la venta de pupusas, comida y antojitos, así se ha mantenido trabajando por una larga temporada, su familia mantiene el mismo núcleo y la situación financiera es más estable. 
Opta por un nuevo préstamo para invertir en granos básicos, verduras, bebidas, pajillas, bolsas, etc.,  para elaborar los alimentos para vender e incorporará la venta de pólvora en época de fin de año para tener ingresos extras.
texts.en: Deysi felt a positive effect from investing her previous loan in her business. Now that she has obtained primary materials to create and sell pupusas, food and snacks she has continued to be employed for a long period of time. Her family is maintaining its same unity and their financial situation is more stable. She has opted to take out a new loan to invest in basic grains, vegetables, drinks, straws, bags, etc. to create meals to sell, and to use to sell gun powder during the new year season in order to obtain extra income.

loans.use: to invest in basic grains, vegetables, drinks, straws, bags, etc. to create meals to sell, and to use to sell gun powder during the new year season.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de productos de revista, es casada, tiene un hijo, vive en casa de un familiar, su esposo es mecánico y su hijo está estudiando; su negocio lo hace de forma ambulante en la ciudad donde vive, sus productos en ocasiones los deja a crédito y luego se dedica a cobrar, con ello da facilidad de pago a sus clientes y mantiene su fidelidad.
Comprará paquetes de lociones, cosméticos, etc., ahorrara en la inversión y los venderá a buen precio para tener mejores ganancias, su propósito es mantener un mejor inventario en la época de fin de año y cubrir las demandas de sus clientes.
Sus objetivos son cancelar la deuda y seguir apoyando en los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
María works selling products from catalogs. She is married and has a son. She lives in the house of a family member. Her husband is a mechanic and her son studies. She does her business door-to-door in the city where she lives. Sometimes she leaves her products on credit and collects, facilitating the payments for her customers and maintaining their loyalty.

She will buy packets of lotions, cosmetics, etc. saving on the cost. She will sell them at a good price to make the most profit. Her plan is to keep a greater inventory for the end of the year and fill her customers demand. Her goals are to pay off her debt and continue to support the household expenses.

loans.use: tobuy packets of lotions, cosmetics, etc. to save on cost and sell at a good price.

loans.name: Santos Orlando

texts.es:
Santos de 28 años de edad, estudio solo 4° grado, es casado y padre de 3 hijos dos niñas y un niño.

Él trabaja en una cooperativa de café, abonando y cortando el café, la mayor parte de su vida a trabajado en la agricultura cosechando frijol y maíz para el consumo de su familia, su esposa también ayuda con los gastos del hogar ya que ella se dedica a la venta de productos de revista el cual le genera ingresos con los cuales ayuda a su esposo.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar lamina, madera, clavos, para  cambiar el techo de su casa,  ya que esta en malas condiciones y la época lluviosa los afecta.

El sueño de Santos, es que su casa sea mas segura y poderles brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Santos is 28 years old. He has a fourth grade education and is married with three children: two girls and a boy. Santos works in a coffee cooperative, fertilizing and harvesting the coffee. For most of his life he has been working in the fields growing beans and corn for his family to eat. His wife helps him to support the family by selling products from catalogs, which generates an income that she uses to help her husband. 

The loan that Santos is requesting is to buy sheet metal, wood, and nails to replace the roof of his house that is in such bad condition for the coming rainy season.

Santos' dream is to make his home safer so that he can offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal, wood, and nails to replace the roof of his house that is in such bad condition for the coming rainy season.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.es: Magdalena de 39 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de 6 años de edad. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que se esfuerza cada día para poder sostener la economía de su hogar por medio de su negocio de venta de mariscos, pero además esta laboriosa mujer elabora y vende tamales de gallina para llevar un poco más de sustento a su hogar. Magdalena desea adquirir un crédito con FUSAI que le permita invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir un cuarto en su vivienda, ya que la misma es muy pequeña, por lo que desea brindarle mayor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Magdalena is 39 years old and lives in her own house with her life companion and her 6 year old son. She is an enterprising woman who makes an effort every day to be able to sustain the household economy through her business selling seafood. Besides this, this hard-working woman makes and sells chicken tamales to bring a little more money into her household.

Magdalena wants to get a loan from FUSAI that will allow her to invest in cement, sand, gravel, bricks and re-bar to construct a room onto her house as it is very small. She wants to provide her family with more comfort.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, bricks and re-bar to construct a room onto her house.

loans.name: Doan

texts.en:
Doan operates a food stall selling fish. She has been involved in this business for seven years. Doan is 38 years old and married with two children. She lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2011, Doan joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Seh has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa FPW. The main hardship that Doan faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet. Doan hopes for her children to do well in school, to maintain a successful business, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet

loans.name: Maria Elizabeth

texts.es: Maria de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica desde hace 15 años a la crianza de pollos y a la venta de semillas de marañón, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde ella reside, Maria esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de concentrado para los pollos y así poder continuar con su trabajo para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Maria is 44 years old and lives in her own house along with her family. Maria has been making a living raising chickens and selling cashews for the last 15 years. She sells her products in the outskirts of the region she lives in. Maria is requesting this loan in order to buy food for her chickens so that she can continue her work and improve her income.

loans.use: to buy food for her chickens.

loans.name: Latafat

texts.en:
Latafat is 27 years old, married, and she has two kids. She is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a grocery store business. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in a populated area. Latafat sells daily products and she has many customers because of her good prices and friendly demeanor when dealing with them. Her monthly income from this business is 300 Manat. Her husband is a taxi driver, but he helps Latafat in his free time.

Latafat is applying for a loan to buy eggs, soft drinks, sweets, sweet bread, etc. so that she can boost her income and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy eggs, soft drinks, sweets, sweet bread, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to construct a pit latrine.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy farm inputs for market gardening

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy farm inputs for market gardening

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks, laminate, etc. to build a bathroom at her house.

loans.name: Benilda

texts.es:
Benilda, mantiene su negocio de venta de tortillas y cultivo de maíz, para ella los créditos son de mucha utilidad para obtener mejores cosechas, ingresos y cambiar las circunstancias familiares.
Hace la solicitud de un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en abono, herbicidas, insecticidas y pago de obreros que le ayuden a limpiar el terreno de la maleza para poder realizar el cultivo de maíz.
texts.en: Benilda is still working in her tortilla business and cultivating corn. For her, these loans are very useful for improving her harvest, increasing her income, and changing her family's circumstances. She is requesting a new loan to invest in fertilizer, weed killer, pesticides, and to pay workers to help her clear her land of weeds so that she can harvest her corn.

loans.use: to invest in fertilizer, weed killer, pesticides and to pay workers to help her clear her land of the weeds so that she can harvest her crops.

loans.name: Balasan

texts.en:
Balasan lives in Sevan city in the Gegharkunik region. She is 51 years old and now she lives with her son, who is 24 years old and works at the school as a warden. Balasan is a very skilled and clever farmer, who for many years has managed to meet her family’s needs through farming alone. Now, farming is again the main income for this family. On her farm, Balasan takes care of two cows, two heifers, a bull, two pigs, six piglets, 11 goats, and 25 chickens. She sells milk, cheese, butter, macun (a national dairy product), meat, and eggs and she already has a lot of customers who constantly buy from her farm.

Balasan hopes that all the hardships she has borne over the years in order to establish this farm have not been in vain and that her son will develop it and make it richer with farm cattle with his wife. She seeks this loan in the amount of 300,000 Armenian drams in order to buy a lot of animal fodder for her cattle to prepare for the coming cold winter months.

loans.use: to buy a lot of animal fodder for her cattle to prepare for the coming cold winter months

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy farm inputs for market gardening

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Ángela una joven de 20 años de edad que estudia la carrera de Administración y Finanzas en un reconocido instituto hace más de 02 años. Ella se siente feliz al poder continuar sus estudios lo cual tiene pensado ayudar a sus padres en cuanto termine su profesión. Actualmente trabaja en un banco en el área de promotora de servicios, la cual le permite cubrir con algunos gastos de sus estudios. Agradece a su madre, pues es ella quien le brinda su apoyo. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para el pago de sus pensiones del instituto. El deseo de Ángela es de terminar satisfactoriamente su carrera y ser competitiva en su rubro. Agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por apoyar a jóvenes con ella.
texts.en:
Ángela is 20 years old and has been studying Administration and Finance at a well-known institute for more than two years. She is happy that she can continue her education and is planning to help her parents once she has finished her studies.

Currently Ángela works for a bank promoting banking services, and this job allows her to cover some of the costs of her education. She is grateful to her mother as she has provided her with support.

The loan she is seeking will be used to pay for board and lodging at the institute. Ángela's wish is to finish getting her qualifications and be competitive in her field. She is grateful to Kiva lenders for providing help to young people like her.

loans.use: Pay for board and lodging at the institute

loans.name: Dalila

texts.es: Dalila de 49 años de edad  vive en casa propia con su hijo y su esposo, ella se dedica desde hace 20 años a la crianza de pollo de engorde y también a la agricultura, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de concentrado para pollos por mayor para poder continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en: Dalila is 49 years old. She lives in her own house with her son and husband. For 20 years, she has worked raising broiler chickens and also in agriculture. She sells her products in the different markets that are close to her house. She is asking for a loan to buy concentrate for her chickens wholesale to be able to continue with her work that generates good profits for her.

loans.use: to buy concentrate for her chickens wholesale.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
Gregoria, elabora  pan para vender, es soltera, vive sola, tiene tres hijos los cuales ya tienen su propio hogar; su negocio está en el mercado desde hace 5 años, dicha actividad la aprendió tomando clases durante un año, posteriormente decidió tener su propia fuente de ingresos, ella atiende sola el negocio y lo realiza de 8:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m., por su experiencia y la calidad de sus productos  ya cuenta con  la preferencia de sus clientes.
Está optando por un crédito que utilizara para comprar una batidora industrial para tener una mayor productividad y variedad de pan, espera tener mejores ingresos con los que cubrirá sus gastos y tendrá una mejor calidad de vida.
Su propósito es expandir su negocio y tener una situación económica más estable.
texts.en:
Gregoria makes bread to sell. She is single and lives alone. She has 3 children who have their own homes. She has had her business at the market for 5 years. She learned the trade taking classes for one year and later she decided to have her own source of money. She takes care of the business by herself and is open from 8 am until 5 pm. She has the loyalty of her customers for her experience and the quality of her products.

She has decided to request a loan that she will use to buy an industrial mixer to have greater productivity and a greater variety of bread. She hopes to have greater income to cover her expenses and have a better quality of living. Her goal is to expand her business and have a more stable economic situation.

loans.use: to buy an industrial mixer to have higher production and a greater variety of bread.

loans.name: Maritza Estela

texts.es: Maritza de 36 años de edad se dedica a la elaboración de antojitos como: papas fritas, yuca frita, empanadas, tamales, etc. que vende de forma en su lugar de residencia, gracias a las ventas que realiza logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con sus cuatro hijos y su esposo, ella solicita un credito para la compra de productos que utiliza en la elaboración de sus antojitos como: aceite, papas, maíz para los tamales, plátanos y todos los ingredientes para su elaboración y así poder seguir manteniendo su hogar y poder solventar los gastos que se le pueden presentar.
texts.en:
36-year old Maritza earns her living making snacks such as fries, fried yucca, empanadas, tamales etc. which she sells from her home. It is thanks to this income that she is able to cover household expenses. She lives in her own home with her four children and husband.

Maritza is seeking a loan to buy ingredients such as oil, potatoes, and corn for the tamales, bananas, and all other items so that she can continue to support her family and pay the bills.

loans.use: Buy oil, potatoes, corn, bananas and other ingredients

loans.name: Haidkul

texts.en:
A kind man by name Haidkul lives in a house in poor condition in a rural area.  His wife is a kind woman as well, who is a housewife.  They have 3 clever children.  Haidkul’s children want to live in a house in good condition, but the income from crop growing business is not enough to keep the home in good condition.  The home currently needs doors and windows to be replaced, because when the weather is cold the windows do not keep the heat inside.  

Haidkul is asking for a loan of 4,000 TJS to buy doors and windows.  This will allow him to offer his family a better quality of life and moral stability that will allow them to progress.  He awaits your support and mercy.

loans.use: to buy doors and windows for his home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase meat, vegetables, flour, drinks, oil, propane gas, etc., a blender and oven so that she will have raw ingredients to make food.

loans.name: Maria Felicita

texts.es:
María, se dedica a vender tamales y pan, negocio que realiza desde hace 28 años, aprendió el oficio de su madre, su jornada de trabajo es de 8:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m., de lunes a domingo, atiende a sus clientes ella sola, poco a poco ha ido mejorando la productividad y rentabilidad de su negocio. Vive con su hija de 17 años, la cual estudia bachillerato.
Utilizará el préstamo para comprar harina, levadura, maíz, carnes, condimentos, aceite, manteca, etc., así podrá elaborar los tamales y el pan para vender, espera tener un ahorro en la inversión y un mejor margen de ganancias.
Su visión es ampliar su negocio, contratar a alguien que le ayude a vender en otro lugar y cambiar el estilo de vida familiar.
texts.en:
María works by selling tamales and bread, a business she's run for 28 years. She learned this skill from her mother. Her workday is from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Mondays through Sundays. She alone attends to her customers. Little by little, she has been improving the productivity and success of her business. She lives with her 17-year-old daughter, who is in high school.

She will use the loan to buy flour, yeast, corn, meat, condiments, cooking oil, butter, and other items to make tamales and bread to sell. She hopes to save from the investment and have a better profit margin.

Her goal is to grow her business, hire someone to help her sell in another location and to change her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy flour, yeast, corn, meat, condiments, cooking oil, butter, and other items to make tamales and bread to sell.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is a resident of Carles in Iloilo. She is 28 years old and married with two children, ages four and nine. 

For the past nine years, she and her husband have worked together to fish for a living. They worked hard for their children. She is asking for a loan to purchase a fishing boat, rope, fishing nets, fishing weights and floaters. These are necessary for daily fishing. Elisa hopes to make her business more progressive and she is driven to make it a success for her family.

In the future, she plans to send her children to school so that they will come professionals.

loans.use: to purchase a fishing boat, rope, fishing nets and weights.

loans.name: Karla Raquel

texts.es:
Karla, utilizo el capital que se le facilito anteriormente para mejor las oferta de ropa a sus clientes, tiene como beneficio nuevos clientes, mejores ingresos y una vida familiar más digna.
Cree que su inventario no será suficientemente grande para surtir las demandas de sus clientes por lo que hace la solicitud de un nuevo préstamo para comprar vestidos, camisetas, chores, faldas, etc., y seguir atendiendo de la mejor manera a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Karla used the capital that was facilitated for her previously to improve her selection of clothing for her customers. The benefit for her has been new customers, better income and a more dignified family life. 

She believes her inventory won't be big enough to meet the demands of her customers and that is why she is asking for a new loan to buy dresses, shirts, shorts, skirts, etc., and to keep serving her customers in the best way.

loans.use: to buy dresses, shirts, shorts, skirts, etc., and to continue serving her customers in the best way.

loans.name: Benkadi 14 Group

texts.fr: Fati est une femme battante qui est mariée et son mari est cultivateur. Elle a 6 enfants dont sont scolarisés. Elle vend des céréales. Avec ce prêt, Fati compte acheter des céréales pour revendre. Ce prêt aidera beaucoup cette femme et les bénéfices lui permettront de solder la scolarité de ses enfants et faire quelques dépenses de sa maison tout en conservant son fonds de roulement pour continuer son activité.
texts.en:
Fati is a strong woman who is married to a farmer. She has six children, who attend school. 

Fati works selling cereals. With this loan, she plans to buy cereals to resell. 

This loan will help Fati a lot, and the earnings will allow her to ensure her children's education and cover some of the household expenses, while also providing the cash flow needed to continue her business.

loans.use: to buy cereals to resell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy farm inputs for market gardening

loans.name: Sirasi

texts.en:
Sirasi is an older, hardworking married man living in Kamwenge Uganda. 

He deals in farming alongside produce selling and buying to earn extra income. He started this business to earn a living and improve on his standards of living. He hopes to be a prominent businessman and a modernized farmer though his main challenge is inadequate capital to buy a large stock of coffee. 

He is requesting a loan to buy more coffee to sell.

loans.use: to purchase more coffee to sell.

loans.name: Marianita

texts.en:
Marianita is a 51-year-old married woman from Leyte, Philippines.  Marianita is standing inside her newly constructed sari-sari (general) store. Marianita needs capital for her business.

Marianita is asking for a loan to buy stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, rice, biscuits, snack foods, soap and detergents, condiments, and others.  This loan will help her improve her business as well as her income.  

In the future, Marianita hopes to make her business sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, rice, biscuits, snack foods, soap and detergents, and condiments.

loans.name: Galasiano

texts.en:
Galasiano is a hardworking married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda.  Farming is his main source of income and the business he started to earn a living. He also earns extra income from produce buying and selling.  He hopes to become rich and construct a quality permanent house, however his main challenge is price fluctuations in his business. 

He is requesting a loan to buy farm inputs like manure and fertilizers to increase soil fertility.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs like manure and fertilizers to increase soil fertility.

loans.name: Claudia Haydee

texts.es: Claudia de 38 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus 2 hijos de 18 y 5 años de edad.  Ella es una mujer emprendedora que se esfuerza cada día para poder sostener la economía de su hogar, apoyada en su negocio de elaboración de prendas de vestir, actividad que realiza desde hace 5 años. Claudia desea construir un cuarto para la cocina, ya que sabe que es un lugar muy importante en el hogar, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para construir un cuarto para la cocina en su vivienda.
texts.en: Claudia, 38, lives in her own home with her life partner and their two children ages 18 and 5.  She is an enterprising woman who works every day to maintain her household through her business in making clothes. She has done this work for 5 years. Claudia wants to build a room for her kitchen, since she knows it’s a very important place in the home. For this reason, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in galvanized laminate, wood, and nails to build a room for the kitchen in her home.

loans.use: to invest in galvanized laminate, wood, and nails to build a room for the kitchen in her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase corn by the quintal (46 kg), and lime.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install wastewater services in her house.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy farm inputs for market gardening

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy farm inputs for market gardening

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel earns a living by raising and selling hogs. She is a thirty-two year old married woman and has three kids, ages 12, 9 and 3. She has been raising hogs for almost ten years. Her husband's occupation is operating a habal-habal (motorcycle with extended seat to accommodate more passengers in a row at the rear seat.)

Maricel has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase materials for pig pen restoration, like wood and cement, and to purchase an additional pig. These will help her to raise hogs with ease and hopefully produce and sell healthy pigs. With this, she can afford to buy nutritious food for her whole family.

Maricel would like to expand her hog raising business to support the welfare of her children especially sending all of them to college.

loans.use: to purchase materials for pig pen restoration, like wood and cement, and to purchase an additional pig

loans.name: Mathias

texts.en:
Mathias  lives in Kamwenge, Uganda and practices farming, and used his previous loan to buy more coffee and maize to sell.  He started this business with the intention of improving his standard of living and looking after his family.  Mathias also earns additional income selling produce.  He still faces challenges of price fluctuations and limited capital.  Mathias hopes to become self-sustaining and rich.  

He is requesting a loan to buy manure for his farm.

loans.use: to buy manure for his farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more scrap and other recyclable materials like tin cans, galvanized iron, aluminium rod and others.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
José, está motivado por un nuevo crédito debido a la facilidad de pago y los buenos beneficios que estos le dan, invertirá en abono, insecticidas, semilla y pagara mozos que le ayuden a limpiar la maleza del terreno en el que sembrara granos básicos, así continuara mejorando su situación económica.
La inversión anterior le dio a José la oportunidad de recolectar la cosecha en el tiempo justo para obtener mejores ganancias y cambiar su estilo de vida por uno más digno.
texts.en:
José is keen to obtain another loan because of the simple repayment system and the benefits that the money provides. He plans to use the money to buy compost, insecticide, seeds, and hire labourers to help him clear the land of weeds.  Then he will plant basic grains and thus continue to improve his financial situation.

His previous loan enabled José to harvest his crops at the right time and earn good money from them. He has been able to change his standard of living to a more dignified one.

loans.use: buy compost, insecticide, seeds, and hire labourers

loans.name: Irene Grace

texts.en:
Irene Grace is a 29-year-old fish vendor from the community of Carles in Iloilo. She is married with one daughter, age seven. For three years now, Irene Grace has been buying fresh fish from fishermen and selling them at a profit. It is not easy work because she has to transport several heavy boxes of fish to the community. But Irene Grace is a hardworking woman who thinks about the future of her child. She is asking for a loan to buy more fresh fish to sell. This will allow her to buy not only in the morning but also in the afternoon, thus increasing her income.

In the future, she hopes to have a more successful fish vending business and dreams of sending her child to school.

loans.use: to buy more fresh fish to sell

loans.name: Rael's Group

texts.en:
Rael is a 44-year-old, proud mother of 5 children. She is a group leader, often described as a very hardworking individual. She is representing her group of 16 farmers in Kakamega South District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2014, Rael has noticed that she has had a healthier life due to better nutrition.

Rael described last year's harvest as good, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, in addition to fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to have light during dark hours so her children can study. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to send her children to school.

With this loan, Rael’s Group will be able to plant a total of 6.5 acres of land and purchase a total of 13 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Mayly

texts.en:
Mayly is 38 years old. She is single and live in Carles, Iloilo. 

Six years ago, Mayly invested in a fishing business. But the recent typhoon in the area has damaged her fishing boat. She is asking for a loan to purchase a new fishing boat so she can continue her business. Her income will help her pay for her daily needs like food, electricity and water. Her profits will also supply her parents with healthy meals. 

In the future, she hopes to become more successful in other businesses too.

loans.use: to purchase a new boat.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is a merchant living in Leyte, Philippines. She is 41 and has three children. Marivic has a sari-sari store and has been in the business for more than a year now. Her husband works as a welder operator.

Marivic is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, soap, toiletries, biscuits and snack foods. This loan will help her improve her store's inventory thus attracting more buyers. 

In the future, Marivic wants to expand her business so that it will generate more income. She also wants to save money for her children's schooling.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, soap,  toiletries, biscuits and snack foods.

loans.name: Benon

texts.en:
Benon is a hardworking married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He practices farming as his main source of income. He started this business for development purposes. He hopes to become a prominent businessman well known for commercial farming, as he hopes to take his project to greater heights. However, his main challenge is inadequate capital and seasonality changes.

Benon intends to use the loan to meet operational costs by paying for labor on his farm.

loans.use: to meet operational costs by paying for labor on his farm.

loans.name: Elemina's Group

texts.en:
Elemina is a 55-year-old, proud mother of 7 children. She is a group leader, often described as a very reliable person, and she is representing her group of 12 farmers in Kakamega North District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2013, Elemina has noticed that she has learned a lot from farming trainings.

Elemina described last year's harvest as good, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, in addition to fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to have light during dark hours so that her children can study. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to save more money for the future.

With this loan, Elemina’s Group will be able to plant a total of 6.5 acres of land and purchase a total of 8 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Gohar

texts.en:
Gohar is from Mkchchyan village, where she lives with her husband and 6-year-old daughter. Gohar owns four greenhouses where she grows a large variety of flowers, and she sells the harvest in local markets.

To be able to prepare her greenhouses for the winter, she needs to make some investments. Gohar is requesting a loan in order to purchase a polyethylene cover for her greenhouse and fertilizer for the flowers. She relies on lenders' support  and hopes to receive the loan, which is very important for her business.

loans.use: to pay for a polyethylene cover for her greenhouse and fertilizer for growing flowers

loans.name: Jane's Group

texts.en:
Jane's Group consists of 16 farmers in Kakamega North District and is being represented by Jane, who is the group leader pictured above. She is 35 years old, is married, and has 4 children. Jane has been a farmer for more than 20 years and is often referred to as a very hardworking individual.

Jane isn’t new to One Acre Fund; she actually joined the program in 2012 and has since noticed her life has changed, especially in the sense that she has learned a lot from farming trainings. This year, Jane will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of her loan, but will also purchase a solar light. She is very excited about this addition because now she will be able to reduce her consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

Using this loan, Jane's Group will purchase a total of 14 solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 10.25 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve her harvests of maize.

loans.name: Dominga Del Carmen

texts.es: Dominga es una mujer trabajadora que cuenta con 72 años de edad, actualmente habita con su grupo familiar, en vivienda propia desde hace muchos años, por lo que es muy conocida en su cantón, por ser una persona emprendedora y solidaria. Ella es una mujer que a pesar de su edad siempre busca la manera de ganarse la vida, es por ello que hace 4 años se dedica a atender el molino de nixtamal que tiene instalado en su vivienda, que es lo que le permite salir adelante. Dominga desea cambiar los materiales con los que está construido el cuarto de la cocina y del molino, por lo que desea adquirir un crédito con FUSAI que le permita comprar: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para el cuarto de la cocina y del molino de su vivienda, y así evitar el mal aspecto que brindan las tablas deterioradas con las que cuenta actualmente.
texts.en: 72-year-old Dominga is a hardworking woman who has now lived for many years with her family in their own home. She is well known in her district as an enterprising and caring person. In spite of her age, she is always on the look-out for ways to earn her living and that is why, for the last 4 years, she has been milling corn flour in her home as a means of supporting herself. Dominga wants to change the materials of which her kitchen and mill are built and so she would like a loan from FUSAI to enable her to buy: galvanised sheeting, wood and nails for her home's kitchen and mill.  This will mean that she can replace the dilapidated planks which look a mess.

loans.use: to buy galvanised sheeting, wood and nails for her home's kitchen and mill.

loans.name: Dora Emma

texts.es: Dora vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella posee desde hace varios años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dora lives in her own home with her husband and daughter.   She has for several years had a small store located in her place of residence.

She has many customers because of her good prices and the friendliness she has when selling.

She is requesting a loan to buy more soups, eggs, grains, soft drinks, candy, pastries, etc. so she can have better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, grains, soft drinks, candy, pastries, etc.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es: Fernando de 45 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su esposa y su hija, el posee un taller de carpintería en el cual fabrica y vende variedad de hermosos y finos muebles, tiene muchos años de dedicarse al negocio y muchas personas lo prefieren ya que él ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus muebles, el está  solicitando un crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de madera, clavos, pega, barniz, junco y de más artículos que logren atraer a más clientes de tal forma que pueda logra su objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: 45-year-old Fernando lives with his wife and daughter in their own home. He owns a carpentry workshop in which he manufactures and sells a range of beautiful, fine furniture.  He has been running his business for many years and many people prefer to buy from him because he offers furniture of good quality at affordable prices. He is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to benefit his business.  He will use it to buy wood, nails, glue, varnish, reeds, etc. so that he can attract more customers and, thereby, achieve his ambition of improving his own and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wood, nails, glue, varnish, reeds, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 22 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace 3 años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, el joven vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ropa para damas y caballeros por mayor, para seguir con su trabajo y asi poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: The young man whose face is pixelated because he is 22 and lives in a high-risk area. He has been selling clothing for 3 years from his premises close to his home and he has a wide clientele. He lives with his family in their own home. He is seeking a loan which will enable him to buy women's and men's clothing in bulk, continue working and, as a result, boost his income.

loans.use: to buy women's and men's clothing in bulk

loans.name: Victor Hugo

texts.es: Victor de 28 años de edad vive se dedica a la crianza de cerdos desde hace 10 años, los comercializa en los pueblo aledaños, con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante, victor vive en casa propia con su madre, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas cerdos y concentrado para seguir con su trabajo que le genera buenos ingresos.
texts.en: 28-year-old Victor has been breeding pigs for 10 years. He sells them in nearby towns and supports himself with his earnings. Victor lives with his mother in their own home. he is seeking a loan to buy more pigs and concentrate feed so he can continue working and earn a good living.

loans.use: to buy more pigs and concentrate feed

loans.name: Nelvie

texts.en:
Nelvie owns a sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in her community. She lives in Leyte, Philippines. Nelvie has been in the business for more than three years now.

Nelvie is asking for a loan to buy more stocks like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, candies, coffee and sugar, and condiments. Nelvie hopes that this loan will help her improve her business as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy more stocks for her store

loans.name: Clementina's Group

texts.en:
Clementina, pictured above, has been a farmer for more than 20 years, and is now proud to represent her group of 10 farmers in Kakamega North District. She is 45 years old, married and has six children.

Clementina likes to think of herself as a very experienced farmer. She has been working alongside One Acre Fund since 2012 and decided to represent her group because she wanted to help more farmers. She says that being part of the One Acre Fund community has meant that she has been able to consistently feed her family. Clementina plans to use the profits from this coming season to save more money for the future.

In total, Clementina’s Group will receive inputs to cultivate 6.75 acres of land. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of five solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize

loans.name: Andrew's Group

texts.en:
Andrew is a 54-year-old proud father of eight children. He is a group leader, often described as a very reliable person, and is representing his group of six farmers in Kakamega North District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2012, Andrew has noticed that he has been able to consistently feed his family.

Andrew described his harvest as very good last year, but believes he can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. He is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because he will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits from this season’s harvest, he plans to send his children to school.

With this loan, Andrew’s Group will be able to plant a total of 3.5 acres of land and purchase a total of six solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Prisca's Group

texts.en:
Prisca is 54 years old and is often described as a very hardworking individual. She has three children and is married. As a group leader, Prisca is representing her group of 14 farmers in Kakamega South District in Kenya, and is very excited to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

The decision to join One Acre Fund was largely a result of Prisca's desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Apart from receiving farming inputs, she is also purchasing a solar light as part of her loan. With the profits that she gains from this year’s harvest, she plans to send her children to school.

Prisca and her group will receive a total of six solar lights as well as input loans of maize and fertilizer to plant a total of 5.5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Dorcas' Group

texts.en:
Dorcas is a 35-year-old, proud mother of 6 children. She is a group leader, often described as a very resourceful person, and she is representing her group of 10 farmers in Kakamega North District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2012, Dorcas has noticed that she has learned a lot from farming trainings.

Dorcas described last year's harvest as good, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing two solar lights, in addition to fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to reduce her consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to send her children to school.

With this loan, Dorcas’s Group will be able to plant a total of 5 acres of land and purchase a total of 13 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase two solar lights and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Vihenda's Group

texts.en:
Vihenda's Group is formed by 13 farmers in Kakamega South District and is represented by Vihenda, who is the group leader pictured above. She is 30 years old, is married, and has 2 children. Vihenda has been a farmer for 18 years and is often referred to as a very hardworking individual.

Vihenda isn’t new to One Acre Fund; she actually joined the program in 2013 and has since noticed her life has changed, especially in the sense that she has had a healthier life due to better nutrition. This year, Vihenda will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of her loan, but she will also purchase a solar light. She is very excited about this addition because now she will have an overall improved quality of life.

Using this loan, Vihenda's Group will purchase a total of 8 solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Godliver's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Godliver, often described as an extremely experienced farmer. She is 32 years old and, as a group leader, she is representing her group of 10 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. She is married and has 4 children.

Godliver is returning this season to work with One Acre Fund again as this means that she is able to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds, which is why she decided to join in the first place. Godliver says that she is happy to have made that decision because, since she first joined in 2012, she has been able to consistently feed her family, which has improved her day-to-day life significantly. Godliver will use the profits from this season to send her children to school.

The group will use this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 4.5 acres. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light with this loan, the group will also receive a total of 5 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize.

loans.name: Nona

texts.en:
Nona and her husband live in Goris town. Her husband is an army officer, and Nona is a farmer. She currently keeps nine cows and three calves. Nona uses the milk and meat gathered from her livestock and sells it in the local market.
 
She is a hardworking young woman who works day and night to sustain her livestock. 

Nona has applied for this loan to ask lenders to support her with developing her business. She would like to purchase two more cows and enlarge the livestock. 

Nona, with a good credit history behind her, relies on lenders' support and goodwill.

loans.use: to pay for two cows

loans.name: Hasmik

texts.en:
Hasmik, who is a farmer from Geghakert village, lives with her husband, 23-year-old son and elderly retired father-in-law. 

Hasmik and her family are involved in the cultivation of haricot, potato, cabbage, cucumber and different types of greens. The cultivation is done in greenhouses which has belonged to their family for many years. 

To make some improvement on their farm and make it more sustainable, Hasmik has applied for this loan. She asks lenders to support her to purchase wires, a polyethylene cover for their greenhouse, and potato seeds (150 kgs). She hopes to receive lenders' support and goodwill to keep running and developing her farm.

loans.use: to pay for wires, a polyethylene cover, for their greenhouse and potato seeds (150 kgs)

loans.name: Jessica Aracely

texts.es: Jessica de 33 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en vivienda propia junto a su hija de 14 años y su pequeño hijo de 1 año de edad. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que se esfuerza cada día para poder sostener la economía de su hogar, por medio de su negocio de venta de platillos típicos, como: pupusas, pasteles de carne, enchiladas, pasteles, yuca frita y sancochada, papas, fritas, etc. Además vende pescado en los mercados por encargo. La vivienda de Jessica está hecha de bajareque, por lo que ella desea repellar las paredes de su vivienda, para evitar de esta manera la anidación de plagas, además desea cambiar el techo del corredor que tiene algunas filtraciones, y para ello solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, lámina, madera y clavos para repellar las paredes y cambiar el techo del corredor de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Jessica, 33, is a single mother.  She lives in her own home with her 14-year-old daughter and her little 1-year-old son.  

She is a hardworking woman who strives every day in order to support her home economically, by means of her business selling traditional food. She sells traditional dishes such as stuffed tortillas, meat pies, enchiladas, pies, boiled and fried yucca, fried potatoes, etc., and she also sells seafood on order in the markets.

Jessica’s home is made of wattle and daub, so she wants to plaster the walls in order to prevent pest infestations.  She also wants to replace the roof of the porch, which has some leaks.   

She is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, sand, sheeting, wood, and nails, in order to plaster the walls of her home and replace the roof of the porch.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, sheeting, wood, and nails, in order to plaster the walls of her home, and replace the roof of the porch.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es: Santiago de 24 años de edad es un hombre soltero que habita en vivienda propia desde hace 21 años, por lo que se siente muy feliz pero a la vez sabe que su vivienda puede tener un poco más de comodidades. Él se gana la vida desde hace 5 años en una empresa cercana en el área de mantenimiento, obteniendo de esta manera los ingresos necesarios para salir adelante. Santiago desea adquirir un crédito con FUSAI el cual le permita invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, hierro y ladrillo para ampliar un cuarto de su vivienda, por lo que espera poder contar con este apoyo lo antes posible.
texts.en: Santiago is 24 years old. He is a single man that has lived in his own house for 21 years. This is something that makes him very happy but he also knows that his house could have a few more home comforts. For five years he has been making a living in a nearby maintenance company from which he earns what he needs to get by. Santiago is asking for a loan through FUSAI which would allow him to purchase cement, sand, gravel, iron and bricks in order to expand a room in his home. He hopes to receive this support as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, gravel, iron and bricks in order to expand a room in his home.

loans.name: Mary's Group

texts.en:
Mary is a 59-year-old proud mother of six children. She is a group leader, is often described as a very hardworking individual, and is representing her group of 12 farmers in Kakamega North District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2012, Mary has noticed that she has been able to consistently feed her family.

Mary described her harvest as very good last year, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel, and therefore, save more money. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to save more money for the future.

With this loan, Mary’s Group will be able to plant a total of 6.25 acres of land and purchase a total of 11 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Miriam Maria

texts.es: Doña Miriam gracias a su primer financiamiento logro dar a sus cultivos de guayaba una excelente atención mediante la compra de insumos agrícolas como: fertilizantes, abonos y logro pagar la mano de obra para hacer el debido y adecuado uso de los mismos al momento de su aplicación. Ella se siente satisfecha y agradecida por que gracias a COMIXMUL y a los diferentes inversionistas en la plataforma de KIVA ella logro obtener una buena producción de guayaba la cual vendió a precio justo con lo cual salió de su compromiso de pago y poder solicitar un nuevo financiamiento con el cual asistirá nuevamente su cultivo de guayaba y una nueva planta que sembró para evitar que esta pueda perderse o ser afectada por alguna plaga pidiendo nueva mente apoyo para compra de más insumos que ayudaran al crecimiento, cuidado y desarrollo de la misma.
texts.en:
Doña Miriam, thanks to her first loan success, was able to give her guava crops excellent care.  She purchased agricultural inputs such as fertilizers, manure and paid for labor and was successful due to the proper use of them at the time of application.

She is satisfied and grateful thanks to COMIXMUL and the various investors in the KIVA organization.  She managed to get good production of guava which sold at a fair price with which she fulfilled her commitment to pay.  

She is now requesting a new loan which will improve guava cultivation and allow her to purchase new plants to avoid the loss or damage by pests.  She is asking for support a second time to buy more inputs to assist the growth, care and development of her crops.

loans.use: to purchase of agricultural inputs to improve her guava crop.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en: Ibrahim is a maize farmer from Kwakwa village in Kaduna state. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Ibrahim would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to provide for his immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Ibrahim can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% more than the market price at harvest. Ibrahim, like other members of Babban Gona, intends to use the extra income to expand his farmland, and he hopes to ensure other members of his community are lifted out of poverty.

loans.use: to buy food food and clothing, thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Marwa Group

texts.en:
Iman is the featured borrower of the Marwa group. She got together with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Maujmoua, because they have always been neighbors and friends, and they are working hard to develop their businesses and lives.

Iman is a 39-year-old divorced mother of four children who has been running her own beauty salon since March 2012, with 17 years of experience in this domain, since she used to work in the same domain in Saudi Arabia, before she came back with her beloved children to live and work in Lebanon.

Iman is working hard to make sure that she can support her children and raise them properly, taking the role of both the caring mother and the hardworking father at the same time.

Today, her acquired loan will be invested in increasing her business merchandise with special winter and Christmas beauty products, accessories and perfumes, since currently she can't afford doing so because of the increased living needs of her children. She is the first lady at the far right side of the picture.

As for the other group members, Rabab is the first from the left, while Sirine is the lady at the center of the picture.

loans.use: to increase her business merchandise with special winter and Christmas beauty products, accessories and perfumes

loans.name: Agnes' Group

texts.en:
Agnes, pictured above, has been a farmer for 15 years, and is now proud to represent her group of 10 farmers in Kakamega North District. She is 34 years old, is married and has five children.

Agnes likes to think of herself as a very reliable person. She has been working alongside One Acre Fund since 2013 and decided to represent her group because she wanted to spread the story of One Acre Fund farmers. She says that being part of the One Acre Fund community has meant that she has learned a lot from farming trainings. Agnes plans to use the profits from this coming season to save more money for the future.

In total, Agnes’s Group will receive inputs to cultivate 5.5 acres of land. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light with this loan, the group will also receive a total of 4 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es: Maria de 52 años de edad vive e casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde desde hace varios años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados y ya tiene clientes establecidos, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de concentrado por mayor para poder continuar con la crianza ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
Maria, 52 years old, lives in her own house with her husband.  She has worked for several years raising and fattening chickens.  She sells her products in different markets and she already has established customers.  

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of wholesale animal feed to be able to continue raising chickens since that is her only source of income.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale animal feed.

loans.name: Enma Liliam

texts.es:
Enma de 53 años de edad,  no tiene un estudio académico,esta casada,su esposo trabaja de empleado en una empresa y son padres de tres hijos; dos viven en su casa y estan estudiando y el otro reside en estados unidos.

Enma es comerciante hace 30 años, el negocio es de venta de tamales de gallina,tiene un puesto en el mercado y también hace por encargo,ya tiene sus clientes fieles,el trabajo se requiere de levantarse muy de mañana a las tres de la madrugada todos los días.

 
El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar unos muebles de la comercial como: una cama y un ropero para su hijo, ya que le sale mas barato sacar el préstamo con la institución; de esa forma lograra tener una mejor calidad de vida.

El objetivo de Enma es seguir trabajando con su negocio y seguir cancelando sus cuotas a tiempo.
texts.en: 53-year-old Enma did not receive an academic education. Her husband is employed in a local business and they have three children, two of whom live at home and are studying.  The other one lives in the United States. Enma has been running a business selling chicken tamales for 30 years. She has a market stall and also makes them to order, as she has loyal customers.  To do her job, she has to get up very early every day - at 3am. The loan she is applying for will be used to buy furniture (a bed and a wardrobe for her son) from the shopping centre. It works out cheaper for her to obtain the loan through the institution and this means that she can have a better quality of life. Enma's ambition is to continue running her business and paying off her debts punctually.

loans.use: to buy furniture from the shopping centre such as: a bed and a wardrobe for her son.

loans.name: Zareena

texts.en:
Zareena  is 50 years old. She is a married woman and a mother of five children. She has been doing a business of tailoring for many years to support her husband. 

She accepted the fact that if her husband works alone for their family, they will not be able to meet the expenses of the household with the educational needs of the children. That is why she started tailoring at home to support her family well. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating a business. 

At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. Now she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR (Pakistnai rupees) to purchase more reels of threads, packs of buttons, ribbons and laces for meeting the orders on time. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. 

Zareena  hopes to grow her business and dreams of providing a better standard of living to her family members.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of threads, packs of buttons, ribbons and laces for meeting the orders on time.

loans.name: Nekruz

texts.en:
Nekruz is a freshman in AUCA's Software Engineering Department and this is his story:

“I think that people with a goal can do anything impossible; they will work hard to achieve goals they have. I know many examples of people with financial problems who became one of the influential people of the world. Bill Gates, Steve Jobs, Mark Zuckerberg are good examples and they changed the world for the better. They couldn’t afford to study, but they used passion to achieve their goals. Therefore, I have a passion to be the best programmer in Central Asia.

"There are various problems in entering the prestigious universities in the world and AUCA is not an exception. Firstly, it’s difficult to pass the entering exams. Secondly, it’s hard to pay the tuition for the majority of students. We are five in our family and my father is the only bread-winner in it. My family lives in Tajikistan and I decided to study at AUCA in Kyrgyzstan, which is more expensive country than Tajikistan. I had a desire to win a Donors’ Scholarship, but couldn’t, that now applying to Kiva loan. I am confident that the loan will offer me a prosperous future for myself and for my family.”

loans.use: to pay for his higher education

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for her vegetable growing business.

loans.name: Rahila Elizabeth

texts.en:
Rahila Elizabeth is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Rahila Elizabeth joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for her children: Lidiya, Jenat and Nicolas.

Before she became a Babban Gona member, Rahila Elizabeth would have had to sell her maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater to her immediate cash needs such as food and clothing.
